title: Can somebody please help me with this font?
content:
I desperately need to find out which font is used in this logo, since I couldn't find and contact original designer who did this. I would appreciate your help.

Many thanks!

| --- | --- |

author: david_dark0

comments.content: Ok, thank you and sorry for this mistake. I will transfer my post there.
